title:
Approximate Completeness of Hypersequent Calculus for First-Order
  {\L}ukasiewicz Logic
abstract:
Hypersequent calculus G{\L}$\forall$ for first-order {\L}ukasiewicz logic was
first introduced by Baaz and Metcalfe, along with a proof of its approximate
completeness with respect to standard $[0,1]$-semantics. The completeness
result was later pointed out by Gerasimov that it only applies to prenex
formulas. In this paper, we will present our proof of approximate completeness
of G{\L}$\forall$ for arbitrary first-order formulas by generalizing the
original completeness proof to hypersequents.
